title: MAGNETIC MASSAGES. WHAT ARE THEY FOR? / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
These images come from the non-verbal hypnosis masterclass of Dr. Marco Paret, who is the world's leading authority in this field. Dr. Paret will demonstrate to us a technique for magnetic massages. Magnetism means working using a principle, that has positive effects even on animals and can heal them. Its main effect is on the visceral nervous system. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
